content: उपलभ् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To know, understand, see, perceive (directly); <ls>Pt. 1. 76</ls>; अन्या प्रतिक्रिया नोपलभ्यते <ls>K. 152.</ls> {@--2@} To ascertain, find out, learn, know; ब्रूहि यदुपलब्धं <ls>U. 1</ls>; तत्त्वत एनामुपलप्स्ये <ls>Ś. 1</ls>; <ls>Mv. 7. 30</ls>; <ls>R. 12. 60</ls>; <ls>Bk. 3. 27</ls>; <ls>K. 159</ls>; <ls>M. 4</ls>, <ls n="M.">3. 6</ls>, <ls n="M.">4. 6.</ls> {@--3@} To get, obtain, acquire, enjoy, experience (happiness &c.); उपलब्धसुखः <ls>Ku. 4. 42</ls> experiencing; कथमुपलभे निद्रां <ls>V. 2. 10</ls> enjoy; इदानीं स्मृतिरुपलब्धा <ls>Mu. 2</ls> now I recollect; <ls>Ms. 11. 17</ls>; <ls>R. 8. 82</ls>, <ls n="R.">10. 2</ls>, <ls n="R.">18. 21</ls>. {@--4@} To conceive, become pregnant. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To cause to get. {@--2@} To produce, bring about.
